revised_title: Observations on the Post-Embryonic Development of Ciona intestinalis and Clavelina lepadiformis
tldr: The author examines the post-embryonic development of Ciona intestinalis and Clavelina lepadiformis, challenging previous theories on the homology of Ascidians and Amphioxus. The study focuses on the fixation and origin of gill-slits, providing new insights into the relationship between these species.
